snippet: Aides to Mitt Romney sought to explain how Mr. Romney's fortunes had so reversed from 2008 in Colorado and Minnesota while trying to minimize the importance of their losses.
abstract: Aides to Mitt Romney sought to explain how Mr. Romney's fortunes had so reversed from 2008 in Colorado and Minnesota while trying to minimize the importance of their losses.

headline.main: Romney Campaign Tries to Put an Optimistic Face on a Disappointing Night
